Hello,


I am a software engineer, I code in JavaScript, HTML, CSS.


Code quality is important to me, but the mindset of the people I work with matters too.

I like to work in an environment that gives me the space to be autonomous and efficient. I feel comfortable in a dynamic team that has a positive impact on society.


I am looking for a company that allows full remote or flexible hours to assiduously practice my sport.

I would like to keep my current salary at least.
